EmailTemplate.subject: Solar Installation Complete Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
We are ready to move along with the next steps in your solar installation process. However we require a few action items in order to proceed.
May we please enlist your help with obtaining your signature on the "Installation Complete" documents that you should have received in your email at {!Contact.Email} . After Palmetto receives your notification that your system has been installed on your home we can move ahead with the final two inspections.
- Inspection from the local municipality (City, County, Town, etc)
- Inspection from your utility provider
Please call your customer care representative at 855-339-1831, if you have any further questions.
Thank You,
Palmetto Customer Care Team
855-339-1831
customer.care@palmetto.com
